english: Four soldiers and twelve civilians were killed.
spanish: Murieron cuatro soldados y doce civiles.

english: Frankly speaking, his speeches are always dull.
spanish: Sinceramente, sus discursos siempre son aburridos.

spanish: Honestamente hablando, sus discursos son siempre aburridos.

english: From their enemies, wise men learn many things.
spanish: Los sabios aprenden mucho de sus enemigos.

spanish: Cada cierto tiempo se paraba y miraba a su alrededor.

english: Generally speaking, women live longer than men.
spanish: Generalizando, las mujeres viven más que los hombres.

english: Happiness isn't merely having many possessions.
spanish: La felicidad no consiste en tener solamente bienes materiales.

english: Happy is the man who is contented with his lot.
spanish: Feliz es el hombre que está contento con su suerte.

english: Has Tom already told you what needs to be done?
spanish: ¿Tom ya te ha dicho lo que hay que hacer?

english: Have you decided on the subject of your thesis?
spanish: ¿Has decidido el tema de tu tesis?

english: Have you ever assembled a computer by yourself?
spanish: ¿Has montado alguna vez un ordenador tu solo?

spanish: ¿Has montado alguna vez un ordenador por ti mismo?

spanish: ¿Alguna vez has decorado tu casa para una fiesta?

spanish: ¿Alguna vez has perdido tu equipaje en el aeropuerto?

spanish: ¿Te has decidido a hacerte profesor?

english: Haven't we had enough of that nonsense already?
spanish: ¿No hemos oído ya suficientes tonterías?

english: He admitted that he wanted to escape from here.
spanish: Él admitió que quería escapar de aquí.

english: He always takes his time in everything he does.
spanish: Él siempre se toma su tiempo para todo lo que hace.

spanish: Empezó a inquietarse con aquel ruido.

spanish: Se apostó conmigo veinte dólares a que no lo haría.

english: He brought me coffee, when I had asked for tea.
spanish: Me trajo un café, aunque había pedido un té.

english: He came to New York in order to look for a job.
spanish: Él vino a Nueva York buscando un empleo.

english: He cannot see the matter from my point of view.
spanish: Él no es capaz de ver la cuestión desde mi punto de vista.

spanish: Él trata con todo tipo de personas.

english: He complains of not having enough time to read.
spanish: Él se queja de no tener suficiente tiempo para leer.

english: He decided to specialize in physics at college.
spanish: Él decidió especializarse en física en la universidad.

english: He deposited 100 dollars in his saving account.
spanish: Él ingresó 100 dólares en su cuenta de ahorros.

english: He didn't like being separated from his family.
spanish: Él no quería separarse de su familia.

english: He didn't succeed in explaining what he wanted.
spanish: No consiguió explicar lo que quería.

english: He does not like carrots, so he did not eat it.
spanish: A él no le gustan las zanahorias, así que no se lo comió.

english: He explained his plan both to my son and to me.
spanish: Él nos explicó su plan a mi hijo y a mí.

english: He gave a detailed description of the accident.
spanish: Él dio una descripción detallada del accidente.

english: He got into this school in September last year.
spanish: Él ingresó a este colegio en septiembre del año anterior.

english: He grumbled because they didn't pay him enough.
spanish: Gruñía porque no le pagaban bastante.

english: He had a serious illness in the autumn of 1823.
spanish: Él padeció una grave enfermedad en el otoño de 1823.

english: He had a traffic accident on his way to school.
spanish: Él tuvo un accidente de tráfico de camino al colegio.

english: He had no intention of waiting for three hours.
spanish: Él no pretendía quedarse esperando tres horas.

english: He had the good fortune to marry a pretty girl.
spanish: Tuvo la suerte de casarse con una chica muy guapa.

english: He hasn't been able to come because he is sick.
spanish: No ha podido venir porque se halla enfermo.

english: He hasn't written them a letter in a long time.
spanish: Hace mucho tiempo que él no les escribe ninguna carta.

english: He is far better off than he was ten years ago.
spanish: Él está en una situación mucho mejor que en la que estaba hace diez años.

english: He is strange, and I don't like strange people.
spanish: Él es raro, y no me gusta la gente rara.

english: He is very nice. He never speaks ill of others.
spanish: Él es muy copado. Nunca habla mal de nadie.

english: He is wealthy in appearance but not in reality.
spanish: Él es rico en apariencia pero no en la realidad.

english: He is working hard to catch up with the others.
spanish: Él está trabajando mucho para ponerse al nivel de los demás.

english: He kept the invaders at bay with a machine gun.
spanish: Él mantuvo a los invasores a la raya con una ametralladora.

english: He left for England at the beginning of August.
spanish: Salió hacia Inglaterra a principio de agosto.

english: He left the Mexican capital to return to Texas.
spanish: Él se fue de la capital de Méjico para regresar a Tejas.

english: He lied to me. That is why I am angry with him.
spanish: Me ha mentido, por eso estoy enfadada con él.

english: He lifted the car with his phenomenal strength.
spanish: Él levantó el automóvil gracias a su fuerza excepcional.

english: He lost his father when he was three years old.
spanish: Perdió a su padre cuando tenía tres años.

english: He makes mistakes every time he speaks English.
spanish: Él comete errores cada vez que habla inglés.

english: He married twice and had more than 20 children.
spanish: Él se casó dos veces y tuvo más de 20 hijos.

english: He notified the police of the traffic accident.
spanish: Informó a la policía del accidente de tráfico.

english: He only listens to rock bands from the fifties.
spanish: Él sólo escucha bandas de rock de los años cincuenta.

english: He picked up a mirror and looked at his tongue.
spanish: Él cogió un espejo y se miró la lengua.

english: He regained consciousness and was able to talk.
spanish: Él recuperó la conciencia y fue capaz de hablar.

english: He rescued the dog at the risk of his own life.
spanish: Él salvó al perro arriesgando su propia vida.

english: He said his father was ill, but that was a lie.
spanish: Él dijo que su padre estaba enfermo, pero eso fue una mentira.

english: He said that he gets up at 6 o'clock every day.
spanish: Él dijo que se levantaba todos los días a las 6 en punto.

english: He seemed to have been working for a long time.
spanish: Parecía que él había estado trabajando por mucho tiempo.

english: He sometimes forgets what he was talking about.
spanish: A veces olvida de que está hablando.

english: He spun both drumsticks very fast in his hands.
spanish: Él hacía girar muy rápidamente ambas baquetas en sus manos.

english: He stayed at home all day instead of going out.
spanish: Él se quedó todo el día en casa en lugar de salir.

english: He told his children not to make so much noise.
spanish: Él dijo a sus niños que no hicieran tanto ruido.

english: He told me that he would visit Nara next month.
spanish: Me dijo que visitaría Nara el próximo mes.

english: He took me by the arm and looked me in the eye.
spanish: Él me cogió del brazo y me miró a los ojos.

english: He tried to solve the problem, but had no luck.
spanish: Intentó solucionar el problema, pero no tuvo suerte.

english: He wants her to go away and leave him in peace.
spanish: Él quiere que ella se marche y le deje en paz.

english: He was about to go out when the telephone rang.
spanish: Estaba a punto de salir cuando sonó el teléfono.

english: He was court-martialed for dereliction of duty.
spanish: Se le formó un consejo de guerra por negligencia en el cumplimiento del deber.

english: He was easily deceived and gave her some money.
spanish: Él fue fácil de engañar, y le dio algo de dinero.

english: He was kind enough to help me with my homework.
spanish: Él fue tan amable de ayudarme con mi tarea.

english: He was lying there with his legs tied together.
spanish: Él estaba tirado ahí con las piernas amarradas.

english: He was sitting on a bench with his eyes closed.
spanish: Estaba sentado en una banca con los ojos cerrados.

english: He was taken care of by a certain young doctor.
spanish: Él fue atendido por un cierto médico joven.

english: He was unsure how he would get there, and when.
spanish: Él no tenía claro cómo llegaría allí y cuándo.

english: He was working at the office yesterday evening.
spanish: Él estaba trabajando en la oficina ayer por la tarde.

english: He will be able to hand in his report tomorrow.
spanish: Él podrá entregar su informe mañana.

english: He will commit suicide if he can't see his son.
spanish: Se suicidará si no puede ver a su hijo.

english: He will have to undergo an operation next week.
spanish: Él tiene que someterse a operación la semana próxima.

english: He witnessed the accident on his way to school.
spanish: Fue testigo del accidente de camino a su colegio.

english: He won the first prize at the chess tournament.
spanish: Él ganó el primer premio en el torneo de ajedrez.

english: He won the first prize at the chess tournament.
spanish: Él ganó el primer premio del torneo de ajedrez.

english: He would tell me the truth, if I would ask him.
spanish: Él me diría la verdad, si le pidiera.

english: He's my best friend. It's like we are brothers.
spanish: Él es mi mejor amigo. Es como si fuéramos hermanos.

english: Heat and light are necessary for our existence.
spanish: El calor y la luz son necesarios para nuestra existencia.

english: Heavy snow delayed the train for several hours.
spanish: La fuerte nevada retrasó al tren durante varias horas.

english: Her application to join the party was rejected.
spanish: Su solicitud para unirse al partido fue rechazada.

english: Her behavior at the party was far from perfect.
spanish: Su comportamiento en la fiesta estuvo lejos de ser perfecto.

english: Her genius makes up for her lack of experience.
spanish: Su ingenio compensa su falta de experiencia.

english: Her grey hair makes her look older than she is.
spanish: Su cabello gris hace que ella parezca más vieja de lo que es.

english: Her husband's illness caused her great anxiety.
spanish: La enfermedad de su marido le causaba mucha ansiedad.

english: His brother went to the station to see him off.
spanish: Su hermano fue a la estación para despedirse de él.

english: His high salary enabled him to live in comfort.
spanish: Su elevado salario le permitió vivir cómodamente.

english: His name is known to everybody in this country.
spanish: Todo el mundo en este país sabe quién es.

english: His niece is attractive and mature for her age.
spanish: Su sobrina es atractiva y madura para su edad.

english: His only wish was to see his son one last time.
spanish: Su único deseo era volver a ver a su hijo por última vez.

english: His statement doesn't leave room for any doubt.
spanish: Su declaración no deja lugar a dudas.

english: His wife and his son were already sound asleep.
spanish: Su mujer y su hijo ya estaban profundamente dormidos.

english: Hold on a minute, please. I'll see if he is in.
spanish: Espere un minuto, por favor. Veré si está adentro.

english: How can you say that our soldiers died in vain?
spanish: ¿Cómo puedes decir que nuestros soldados murieron en vano?

spanish: ¿Cómo consiguió Tom que Mary y John dejasen de pelear?

spanish: ¿Cómo llego a tu oficina desde la Estación de Tokio?

spanish: ¿Cómo consigues que tus hijos se coman las verduras?

spanish: ¿Cómo crees que te verías usando ese vestido?

spanish: ¿Cómo crees que lucirías llevando ese vestido puesto?

spanish: ¿Cómo es que siempre estás tan lleno de energía?

spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo nos tomó traducir este libro?

english: How long do you intend to spend at the library?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo pensás pasar en la biblioteca?

english: How long do you intend to spend at the library?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo piensas pasar en la biblioteca?

english: How long does it take from here to the station?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo se tarda en ir desde aquí hasta la estación?

english: How long does it take to get to Vienna on foot?
spanish: ¿Cuánto se tarda en ir a Viena a pie?

english: How many Christmas cards did you get last year?
spanish: ¿Cuántas tarjetas de Navidad recibiste el año pasado?

english: How many books do you think you've read so far?
spanish: ¿Cuántos libros crees que has leído hasta el momento?

spanish: ¿Cuántos de ustedes planean estar aquí otra vez mañana?

spanish: ¿A cuánta gente invitaste a tu boda?

spanish: ¿Cuántos estudiantes hay en tu universidad?

spanish: ¿Cuántos estudiantes hay en vuestra universidad?

english: How many students are there in your university?
spanish: ¿Cuántos estudiantes hay en su universidad?

spanish: ¿Cuántas veces en una hora salen los autobuses desde aquí?

english: How much more time do you think this will take?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo crees que tomará esto?

english: How much time do you spend cleaning your house?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo pasás limpiando tu casa?

english: I am disappointed that my friends are not here.
spanish: Estoy decepcionado de que mis amigos no estén aquí.

english: I am disappointed that my friends are not here.
spanish: Me decepciona que mis amigos no estén aquí.

english: I am getting fat because I eat a lot of sweets.
spanish: Estoy engordando porque como muchos dulces.

english: I am not used to drinking coffee without sugar.
spanish: No estoy acostumbrado a tomar el café sin azúcar.

english: I applied to be an attendant at the exposition.
spanish: Eché una solicitud como empleado en la exposición.

english: I bet we'll see Tom before the end of the week.
spanish: Apuesto a que veremos a Tom antes del final de la semana.

english: I bought the black bike instead of the red one.
spanish: Compré la bicicleta negra en lugar de la roja.

english: I bought this book for myself, not for my wife.
spanish: Compré este libro para mí, no para mi esposa.

english: I buy things that I know I am not going to use.
spanish: Compro cosas que sé que no voy a usar.

english: I buy things that I know I am not going to use.
spanish: Compro cosas que sé que no voy a utilizar.

english: I can't believe Tom never told Mary about John.
spanish: No puedo creer que Tom nunca hablase a Mary de John.

english: I can't believe you're talking to me like this.
spanish: No me puedo creer que me estés hablando así.

english: I can't figure out how to operate this machine.
spanish: No puedo descubrir como operar esta máquina.

english: I can't help but think you're making a mistake.
spanish: No puedo evitar pensar que estás en un error.

english: I can't help it if girls want to flirt with me.
spanish: No puedo evitarlo si las chicas quieren flirtear conmigo.

english: I can't help thinking my father is still alive.
spanish: No puedo evitar pensar que mi padre sigue con vida.

english: I can't kiss you the way you want to be kissed.
spanish: No puedo besarte de la manera en que quieres que te besen.

english: I can't prove it, but I'm sure he was murdered.
spanish: No lo puedo demostrar, pero estoy seguro de que le asesinaron.

english: I can't prove it, but I'm sure he was murdered.
spanish: No lo puedo demostrar, pero estoy seguro de que fue asesinado.

english: I can't tell Tom and his younger brother apart.
spanish: No puedo diferenciar a Tom de su hermano pequeño.

english: I can't tell you exactly how long it will take.
spanish: No puedo decirte exactamente cuanto tardará.

english: I checked into a hotel and went right to sleep.
spanish: Me registré en un hotel y me fui directamente a dormir.

english: I checked to make sure that he was still alive.
spanish: Confirmé que él aún estaba vivo.

english: I could keep it a secret, but not for too long.
spanish: Podría guardar el secreto, pero no por mucho tiempo.

english: I couldn't have done it without you. Thank you.
spanish: No podría haberlo hecho sin ti. Gracias.

english: I decided to go to college to major in English.
spanish: Decidí ir a la universidad para especializarme en Inglés.

english: I didn't feel like scolding her for being late.
spanish: No tenía ganas de echarle la bronca por haber llegado tarde.

english: I didn't like that game until I started to win.
spanish: No me gustaba ese juego hasta que empecé a ganar.

english: I didn't recognize Tom the last time I saw him.
spanish: No reconocí a Tom la última vez que lo vi.

english: I didn't tell anyone what time I'd be arriving.
spanish: No le dije a nadie a qué hora llegaría.

english: I didn't want his help, but I had to accept it.
spanish: Yo no quería su ayuda, pero tuve que aceptarla.

english: I don't even know if I want to do this anymore.
spanish: Ni siquiera sé si quiero seguir haciendo esto.

english: I don't have enough space to store these boxes.
spanish: No tengo suficiente espacio para guardar estas cajas.

english: I don't know how you can believe such nonsense.
spanish: No sé cómo podés creer esas tonterías.

english: I don't know whether I can do it, but I'll try.
spanish: No sé si lo pueda hacer, pero lo voy a intentar.

spanish: No sé si tendré tiempo para hacerlo.

english: I don't know whether to go to the party or not.
spanish: No sé si ir a la fiesta o no.

english: I don't know why they are so steamed off at us.
spanish: No sé por qué están tan enojados con nosotros.

english: I don't like my brother climbing the mountains.
spanish: No me gusta que mi hermano escale esas montañas.

english: I don't like the idea that money is everything.
spanish: No me agrada la idea de que el dinero sea todo.

english: I don't need your money. I just need your time.
spanish: Yo no necesito tu dinero. Solo necesito tu tiempo.

english: I don't really understand what you want to say.
spanish: En realidad no entiendo lo que quieres decir.

english: I don't see any reason why I have to apologize.
spanish: No veo por qué debería disculparme.

english: I don't see what any of this has to do with me.
spanish: No veo qué de todo esto tiene que ver conmigo.

english: I don't think Tom and Mary have much in common.
spanish: No pienso que Tom y Mary tengan mucho en común.

english: I don't think it's necessary for us to do that.
spanish: No creo que tengamos que hacer eso.

english: I don't think it's necessary for us to do this.
spanish: No creo que tengamos que hacer esto.

english: I don't think you have anything to worry about.
spanish: No creo que tengas nada de que preocuparte .

english: I don't want Tom to think he has to protect me.
spanish: No quiero que Tom crea que tiene que protegerme.

english: I don't want an apology. I want an explanation.
spanish: No quiero una disculpa. Quiero una explicación.

english: I don't want to make the same mistake Tom made.
spanish: No quiero cometer el mismo error que Tom.

english: I entered Tom's name on the list of candidates.
spanish: Puse el nombre de Tom en la lista de candidatos.

english: I escaped the accident by the skin of my teeth.
spanish: Me salvé del accidente por un tilín.

english: I fall asleep easily while watching television.
spanish: Me duermo fácilmente mientras miro televisión.

english: I found a bird whose wing was severely damaged.
spanish: Encontré un ave que tenía el ala gravemente dañada.

english: I found it difficult to keep a diary every day.
spanish: Encontré difícil escribir en un diario todos los días.

english: I found it difficult to make myself understood.
spanish: Me costó hacerme entender.

english: I found the problem easier than I had expected.
spanish: Encontré que el problema era más sencillo de lo que esperaba.

english: I got a letter from a friend of mine in London.
spanish: Recibí una carta de un amigo mío que está en Londres.

english: I got him to wash my car for a hundred dollars.
spanish: Lo hice lavar mi auto por cien dólares.

english: I got several bites, but could not hook a fish.
spanish: Tengo varias mordidas, pero no pude atrapar un pez.

english: I got to know my current girlfriend at the gym.
spanish: Conocí a mi novia actual en el gimnasio.

english: I got up early enough to catch the first train.
spanish: Me levanté lo bastante temprano como para coger el primer tren.

english: I had been reading for an hour when he came in.
spanish: Había estado leyendo por una hora cuando él entró.

english: I had never seen a panda until I went to China.
spanish: Hasta que fui a China nunca había visto un panda.

english: I had no doubt that Tom would do what we asked.
spanish: No tenía ninguna duda de que Tom haría lo que le pedimos.

english: I have a classmate who has a motorboat license.
spanish: Tengo un compañero de clase que tiene carné para lancha motoras.

english: I have a dog. He is black and his name is Tiki.
spanish: Tengo un perro. Es negro y su nombre es Tiki.

english: I have a friend who feeds his dog strawberries.
spanish: Yo tengo un amigo que le da de comer frutillas a su perro.

english: I have a friend who feeds his dog strawberries.
spanish: Tengo un amigo que le da de comer fresas a su perro.

english: I have a friend whose father is a famous actor.
spanish: Tengo un amigo cuyo padre es un actor famoso.

english: I have almost no information about the problem.
spanish: No tengo casi información sobre el problema.

english: I have an appointment to visit a guru in India.
spanish: Tengo una cita para visitar a un gurú en la India.

english: I have been studying English for six years now.
spanish: Llevo seis años estudiando inglés.

english: I have just been to the airport to see him off.
spanish: Acabo de estar en el aeropuerto para despedirme de él.

english: I have lots of work to clear up by the weekend.
spanish: Tengo mucho trabajo que terminar para el fin de semana.

english: I have lunch with the manager almost every day.
spanish: Almuerzo con el gerente casi todos los días.

english: I have no choice but to eat what they serve me.
spanish: No tengo más opción que comer lo que ellos me sirvan.

english: I have no idea to what extent I can trust them.
spanish: No sé hasta qué punto puedo confiar en ellos.

english: I have no intention whatever of disturbing you.
spanish: No tengo ninguna intención de estorbarte.

english: I have the impression that he knows the secret.
spanish: Tengo la impresión de que conoce el secreto.

english: I have the same dictionary as your brother has.
spanish: Tengo el mismo diccionario que tu hermano.

english: I have to check and see what the contract says.
spanish: Tengo que revisar lo que dice el contrato.

english: I have to go shopping. I'll be back in an hour.
spanish: Tengo que ir de compras, estaré de vuelta en una hora.

english: I haven't been able to get enough sleep lately.
spanish: Últimamente no he podido dormir lo suficiente.

english: I haven't eaten chocolate since I was thirteen.
spanish: No he comido chocolate desde que tenía trece años.

english: I haven't met him in person, but I know of him.
spanish: No lo he conocido en persona, pero lo conozco.

english: I haven't read the final page of the novel yet.
spanish: Aún no he leído la última página de esa novela.

english: I heard a strange sound coming from the garage.
spanish: Oí un sonido extraño en la cochera.

english: I heard strange noises coming from his bedroom.
spanish: Oí extraños ruidos venir de su habitación.

english: I heard you were having problems at the office.
spanish: Escuché que estabas teniendo problemas en la oficina.

english: I hope it won't be long before I hear from her.
spanish: Espero que no pase mucho tiempo antes de oír de ella.

english: I hope to graduate from university next spring.
spanish: Espero sacarme el graduado universitario la próxima primavera.

english: I just thought of something really interesting.

spanish: Está bien mientras nadie se entere de eso.

english: It's possible that Tom isn't telling the truth.
spanish: Es posible que Tom no esté diciendo la verdad.

english: It's really dark in here. I can't see anything.
spanish: Está realmente oscuro aquí. No puedo ver nada.

english: It's unusual for you to do something like that.
spanish: Es raro que tú hagas algo así.

english: It's up to you to keep things running smoothly.
spanish: Depende de ti mantener las cosas funcionando sin contratiempos.

english: Jonas Salk developed the polio vaccine in 1952.
spanish: Jonas Salk desarrolló la vacuna contra la polio en 1952.

english: Just between you and me, do you love my sister?
spanish: Entre vosotros y yo, ¿os gusta mi hermana?

english: Just between you and me, do you love my sister?
spanish: Entre usted y yo, ¿le gusta mi hermana?

english: Just tell me what you know about the situation.
spanish: Sólo dime lo que sabes de la situación.

english: Lake Geneva is the largest lake in Switzerland.
spanish: El lago Lemán es el lago más grande en Suiza.

english: Last year was a period of economic uncertainty.
spanish: El año pasado fue un período de incertidumbre económica.

english: Leaves are to plants what lungs are to animals.
spanish: Las hojas son para las plantas lo que los pulmones son para los animales.

english: Lend me something with which to cut the string.
spanish: Pásame algo con qué cortar la cuerda.

english: Let me show you around the town this afternoon.
spanish: Te daré una vuelta por la ciudad esta tarde para enseñártela.

english: Let's hope Tom didn't do what you think he did.
spanish: Esperemos que Tom no haya hecho lo que pensás que hizo.

english: Let's hope the situation doesn't get any worse.
spanish: Esperemos que la situación no empeore.

english: Let's meet halfway between your house and mine.
spanish: Encontrémonos a mitad de camino entre tu casa y la mía.

english: Like it or not, you have to do that right away.
spanish: Te guste o no, tienes que hacer eso ahora mismo.

english: Lincoln agreed that all slaves should be freed.
spanish: Lincoln estaba de acuerdo en que todos los esclavos debían ser liberados.

english: Many people were deceived by the advertisement.
spanish: Mucha gente fue engañada por ese anuncio.

english: Married people sometimes wish they were single.
spanish: A veces los casados desearían ser solteros.

english: Mary baked three dozen cookies for Tom's party.
spanish: María horneó tres docenas de galletas para la fiesta de Tom.

english: Mary celebrates New Year's Day with her family.
spanish: Mary celebra el Año Nuevo con su familia.

english: Mary is a very beautiful and interesting woman.
spanish: María es una mujer muy hermosa e interesante.

english: Mary is not my girlfriend. She's just a friend.
spanish: Mary no es mi novia. Es sólo una amiga.

english: Mary opposed her son's decision to get married.
spanish: Mary estaba en contra de la decisión de su hijo de casarse.

english: Maybe a few of you have seen pandas in the zoo.
spanish: Tal vez algunos de ustedes han visto pandas en el zoológico.

english: Miniskirts have been out of date for some time.
spanish: Las minifaldas estuvieron pasadas de moda durante un tiempo.

english: Moderate exercise is necessary for good health.
spanish: El ejercicio moderado es necesario para tener buena salud.

english: More than a million old people are sick in bed.
spanish: Más de un millón de ancianos están en cama enfermos.

english: Most of the students here go to school on bike.
spanish: La mayoría de los alumnos de aquí va a la escuela en bicicleta.

english: Most people know that sea water is undrinkable.
spanish: La mayoría de las personas saben que el agua de mar es imbebible.

english: Most young people don't know the terror of war.
spanish: La mayoría de los jóvenes no conocen los horrores de la guerra.

english: My aunt lives in a lonely house in the country.
spanish: Mi tía vive en una casa solitaria en el campo.

english: My boyfriend sometimes flirts with other girls.
spanish: A veces, mi novio flirtea con otras chicas.

english: My colleague and her husband are both American.
spanish: Mi colega y su marido son ambos americanos.

english: My computer has got to be useful for something.
spanish: Mi ordenador tiene que ser útil para algo.

english: My computer has got to be useful for something.
spanish: Mi ordenador tiene que servir para algo.

english: My father and mother were sitting under a tree.
spanish: Mi padre y mi madre estaban sentados bajo un árbol.

english: My father drinks a cup of coffee every morning.
spanish: Mi padre toma un café todas las mañanas.

english: My father is so old that he is hard of hearing.
spanish: Mi padre es tan viejo que es duro de oído.

english: My father is so old that he is hard of hearing.
spanish: Mi padre es tan viejo que le cuesta oír.

english: My father often falls asleep while watching TV.
spanish: Mi padre suele quedarse dormido viendo la televisión.

english: My father was absent from his office yesterday.
spanish: Mi padre ayer no estaba en la oficina.

english: My father works for the company as an engineer.
spanish: Mi padre trabaja como ingeniero en la compañía.

english: My father's birthday falls on Sunday this year.
spanish: El cumpleaños de mi padre cae en domingo este año.

english: My friend Tom has twice as many stamps as I do.
spanish: Mi amigo Tom tiene el doble de sellos que yo.

english: My grandfather is still sound in mind and body.
spanish: Mi abuelo todavía está en su sano juicio y en sana salud.

english: My little brother goes to an elementary school.
spanish: Mi hermano menor va a la escuela primaria.

english: My name is Tom and I'll be your server tonight.
spanish: Me llamo Tom y seré su camarero esta noche.

english: My neighbor's son was killed by a drunk driver.
spanish: Un conductor ebrio mató al hijo de mi vecino.

english: My parents gave me a house when we got married.
spanish: Mis padres me dieron una casa cuando nos casamos.

english: My parents prohibited me from seeing Tom again.
spanish: Mis padres me prohibieron volver a ver a Tom.

english: My sister is thin, but I'm a little overweight.
spanish: Mi hermana es delgada, pero yo soy gordita.

english: My teacher guided me in the choice of a career.
spanish: Mi profesor me guió en la elección de mi carrera.

english: My three-year-old niece kissed me on the cheek.
spanish: Mi sobrina de 3 años me dio un beso en la mejilla.

english: My uncle lives in Madrid, the capital of Spain.
spanish: Mi tío vive en Madrid, la capital de España.

english: My uncle met with a traffic accident yesterday.
spanish: Ayer mi tío tuvo un accidente de tráfico.

english: Nero did not actually fiddle while Rome burned.
spanish: Nerón en realidad no jugaba mientras Roma se quemaba.

english: Never open the door of a car that is in motion.
spanish: Nunca abras la puerta de un auto en movimiento.

english: No matter how tired I might be, I have to work.
spanish: No importa lo cansado que pueda estar, tengo que trabajar.

english: No matter what you say, I won't change my mind.
spanish: No importa lo que digas, no cambiaré de parecer.

english: No one can blame you for being a little scared.
spanish: Nadie puede culparte por estar un poco asustado.

english: Nobody is in the living room, but the TV is on.
spanish: No hay nadie en la sala de estar, pero el televisor está encendido.

english: Not all the infectious diseases are contagious.
spanish: No todas las enfermedades infecciosas son contagiosas.

english: Not knowing what to do, I asked him for advice.
spanish: Al no saber qué debía hacer, le pedí consejo.

english: Not only did he give me advice, but also money.
spanish: No sólo me dio el consejo, sino también el dinero.

english: Oh, I'm sorry. I guess I have the wrong number.
spanish: Lo siento. Creo que marqué el número equivocado.

english: Once a species goes extinct, it's gone forever.
spanish: Una vez que una especie se extingue, desaparece para siempre.

english: Once you get to know her, she is very friendly.
spanish: Una vez que la conoces, es muy amable.

english: One million people lost their lives in the war.
spanish: Un millón de personas perdieron la vida en la guerra.

english: One of her cars is blue and the others are red.
spanish: Uno de sus coches es azul y los demás son rojos.

english: One of my friends can speak French fairly well.
spanish: Uno de mis amigos sabe hablar francés bastante bien.

english: One of my friends says he wants me to meet you.
spanish: Uno de mis amigos dice que quiere conocerte.

english: Our car broke down in the middle of the street.
spanish: Nuestro auto quedó en pana en medio de la calle.

english: Our country must develop its natural resources.
spanish: Nuestro país debe explotar sus recursos naturales.

english: Our teacher said, "Water boils at 100 degrees."
spanish: Nuestro profesor dijo, "El agua hierve a los 100 grados".

english: Painting is another thing I can do fairly well.
spanish: Pintar es otra cosa que puedo hacer bastante bien.

english: Paris is one of the cities I visited last year.
spanish: París es una de las ciudades que visité el año pasado.

english: Please don't let the children play with knives.
spanish: Por favor, no deje que los niños jueguen con cuchillos.

english: Please say a prayer for those who were onboard.
spanish: Por favor diga una plegaria por aquellos que estuvieron a bordo.

english: Please spend a few minutes thinking about this.
spanish: Por favor, piensa unos minutos sobre esto.

english: Please turn off the light before you go to bed.
spanish: Apaga la luz antes de acostarte, por favor.

english: Please wash the lettuce well before you eat it.
spanish: Por favor, lava bien la lechuga antes de comértela.

english: Prices are double what they were two years ago.
spanish: Los precios son el doble que hace dos años.

english: Push the green button and the light will go on.
spanish: Oprime el botón verde y la luz se enciende.

english: Push the green button and the light will go on.
spanish: Aprieta el botón verde y la luz se prende.

english: Put a piece of cake aside for me. I have to go.
spanish: Guárdame un trozo de tarta, que tengo que irme.

english: Religion was very important in the Middle Ages.
spanish: La religión era muy importante en la Edad Media.

english: Sake is a traditional Japanese alcoholic drink.
spanish: El sake es una bebida alcohólica tradicional japonesa.

english: Scientists haven't found a cure for cancer yet.
spanish: Los científicos todavía no han hallado la cura contra el cáncer.

english: See to it that you don't make the same mistake.
spanish: Asegúrate de no cometer el mismo error.

english: Senator Hoar spoke strongly against the treaty.
spanish: El senador Hoar habló duramente contra el tratado.

english: Send this message to as many people as you can.
spanish: Envía este mensaje al mayor número de personas posible.

english: She advised him to take better care of himself.
spanish: Le aconsejó que se cuidara más.

english: She asked me to stay till her mother came home.
spanish: Ella me pidió que me quedara hasta que su madre volviera a casa.

english: She assisted her mother in caring for the baby.
spanish: Ella ayudó a su madre a cuidar del bebé.

english: She breaks a dish every time she washes dishes.
spanish: Ella rompe un plato cada vez que los lava.

english: She came home for the first time in five years.
spanish: Ella regresó a casa por primera vez en cinco años.

english: She can speak not only English but also French.
spanish: Ella no habla solamente inglés, también habla francés.

english: She caught hold of my arm so she wouldn't fall.
spanish: Se agarró de mi brazo para no caerse.

english: She combed her hair and bound it with a ribbon.
spanish: Se peinó el pelo y se lo amarró con un listón.

english: She combed her hair and bound it with a ribbon.
spanish: Ella se peinó el cabello y se lo ató con una cinta.

english: She could not keep her daughter from going out.
spanish: Ella no pudo impedir que su hija saliera.

english: She couldn't convince him to buy her a new car.
spanish: Ella no lo pudo convencer para que le comprara un auto nuevo.

english: She deposited a large sum of money in the bank.
spanish: Ella depositó una gran suma de dinero en el banco.

english: She did not eat anything until she was rescued.
spanish: Ella no comió nada hasta que la rescataron.

english: She didn't want him to go out with other women.
spanish: Ella no quería que él saliera con otras mujeres.

english: She feeds her dog the same thing that she eats.
spanish: Ella le da de comer a su perro lo mismo que ella come.

english: She gave a narrative of her strange experience.
spanish: Ella narró su extraña experiencia.

english: She held back her anger, and smiled graciously.
spanish: Ella contuvo su rabia y sonrió gentilmente.

english: She installed a new electric stove in the room.
spanish: Ella instaló una nueva estufa eléctrica en la pieza.

english: She intends to participate in a beauty contest.
spanish: Ella tiene la intención de participar en un concurso de belleza.

english: She is attractive when she is dressed in white.
spanish: Ella es atractiva cuando se viste de blanco.

english: She is not the kind of person you think she is.
spanish: Ella no es la clase de persona que crees que es.

english: She is one of the best ballerinas in the world.
spanish: Ella es una de las mejores bailarinas del mundo.

english: She is trying to prove the existence of ghosts.
spanish: Ella está tratando de demostrar la existencia de los fantasmas.

english: She is trying to save as much money as she can.
spanish: Ella está tratando de ahorrar todo lo posible.

english: She is well known both in Japan and in America.
spanish: Ella es famosa tanto en Japón como en Estados Unidos.

english: She lives within a stone's throw of the school.
spanish: Vive muy cerca de la escuela.

english: She made it plain that she wanted to marry him.
spanish: Ella dejó bien claro que se quería casar con él.

english: She missed her chance to see the famous singer.
spanish: Ella perdió la oportunidad de ver a la cantante famosa.

english: She rarely sings, but I think she will tonight.
spanish: Ella rara vez canta, pero yo creo que esta noche lo hará.

english: She received the maximum sentence of ten years.
spanish: Ella recibió la pena máxima de diez años.

english: She refuses to abandon her career for marriage.
spanish: Ella se niega a dejar su carrera por el matrimonio.

english: She said that she takes a shower every morning.
spanish: Ella dijo que se da una ducha todas las mañanas.

english: She seldom sings, but I think she will tonight.
spanish: No suele cantar, pero creo que va a cantar esta noche.

english: She seldom sings, but I think she will tonight.
spanish: Ella rara vez canta, pero yo creo que esta noche lo hará.

english: She spends a lot of money when she goes abroad.
spanish: Ella gasta mucho dinero cuando va al exterior.

english: She spent many days knitting a sweater for him.
spanish: Ella pasó muchos días tejiendo un suéter para él.

english: She started kissing him as soon as he got home.
spanish: Ella empezó a besarle en cuanto llegó a casa.

english: She suggested that I give it to him right away.
spanish: Ella sugirió que se lo entregada en seguida.

english: She suggested that I should clean the bathroom.
spanish: Ella sugirió que debería limpiar el baño.

english: She suggested that the customer buy a blue tie.
spanish: Ella le recomendó al cliente una corbata azul.

english: She thinks about him when she's feeling lonely.
spanish: Ella piensa en él cuando se siente sola.

english: She thinks of herself as an intelligent person.
spanish: Ella se considera una persona inteligente.

english: She tried to squeeze the juice from the orange.
spanish: Ella trató de exprimir el jugo de la naranja.

english: She tried to squeeze the juice from the orange.
spanish: Intentó exprimir el jugo de la naranja.

english: She was advised by him to listen to her doctor.
spanish: Le aconsejaron que escuchara al médico.

english: She was angry. That is why she remained silent.
spanish: Estaba enfadada. Por eso se quedó callada.

english: She was brushing her hair in front of a mirror.
spanish: Ella se estaba peinando frente al espejo.

english: She was jealous of her neighbor's good fortune.
spanish: Ella tenía envidia de la buena fortuna de su vecino.

english: She was kind enough to show me around the town.
spanish: Ella fue tan amable de mostrarme la ciudad.

english: She was not the first to encourage me to do so.
spanish: Ella no fue la primera en alentarme a hacer eso.

english: She was ready to help him with washing the car.
spanish: Ella estaba lista para ayudarlo a lavar el auto.

english: She was very surprised when she heard the news.
spanish: Ella se sorprendió mucho cuando escuchó la noticia.

english: She will be the first Japanese woman astronaut.
spanish: Ella será la primera mujer japonesa astronauta.

english: She's curious to find out who sent the flowers.
spanish: Ella tiene curiosidad por saber quién mandó las flores.

english: She's curious to find out who sent the flowers.
spanish: Ella tiene curiosidad por saber quién le envió las flores.

english: She's curious to find out who sent the flowers.
spanish: Ella quiere saber quién le envió las flores.

english: She's not a full-time employee of this company.
spanish: Ella no es una empleada a tiempo completo de la empresa.

english: Signs that say "high voltage" are often yellow.
spanish: Los letreros donde dice "alta tensión" frecuentemente son amarillos.

english: Since I was all by myself, I felt a bit lonely.
spanish: Me sentía un poco solo porque no tenía compañía.

english: Six men came forward to volunteer for the work.
spanish: Seis hombres se ofrecieron como voluntarios para trabajar.

english: Six men came forward to volunteer for the work.
spanish: Seis hombres se ofrecieron como voluntarios para hacer el trabajo.

english: Slavery was legal in the new Republic of Texas.
spanish: La esclavitud era legal en la nueva República de Texas.

english: Sleep is no less necessary to health than food.
spanish: El sueño no es menos necesario para la salud que la comida.

english: Smoking is banned in restaurants in California.
spanish: Está prohibido fumar en los restaurantes de California.

english: So, you're sure you don't want to go to Boston?
spanish: Entonces, ¿estás seguro de que no quieres ir a Boston?

english: Some animals will not breed when kept in cages.
spanish: Algunos animales no se reproducen cuando se les mantiene enjaulados.

english: Some go to school by bicycle, others go by bus.
spanish: Algunos van al colegio en bicicleta; otros, en autobús.

english: Some people gain weight when they quit smoking.
spanish: Algunas personas engordan cuando dejan de fumar.

english: Some stars are hardly visible to the naked eye.
spanish: Ciertas estrellas son apenas visibles a simple vista.

english: Someday she'll have to pay for what she's done.
spanish: Algún día ella tendrá que pagar por lo que ha hecho.

english: Someone must have taken my umbrella by mistake.
spanish: Alguien debe de haber cogido mi paraguas por error.

english: Something happened here, but I don't know what.
spanish: Algo pasó acá, pero no sé qué.

english: Sometimes she tried talking to him about India.
spanish: Ella a veces trataba de hablarle acerca de India.

english: Sorry, but I think you've got the wrong number.
spanish: Lo siento, creo que se ha equivocado de número.

english: Spanish is spoken in Central and South America.
spanish: En Centro y Sur América se habla español.

english: Table manners vary from one country to another.
spanish: Los modales a la mesa varían de país en país.

english: Thank you for clearing up the misunderstanding.
spanish: Gracias por aclarar el malentendido.

english: Thank you very much for your generous donation.
spanish: Gracias por su generosa donación.

english: Thanks to his efforts, all the crew were saved.
spanish: Gracias a sus esfuerzos, se salvó toda la tripulación.

english: That book's done a lot to popularize chemistry.
spanish: Ese libro ha contribuido mucho a divulgar la química.

english: That box is too small to hold all these things.
spanish: Esa caja es demasiado chica para contener todas estas cosas.

english: That car's so big that parking it is difficult.
spanish: Ese auto es tan grande, que estacionarlo es difícil.

english: That island was governed by France at one time.
spanish: Esa isla fue gobernada por Francia en algún momento.

english: That material's going to shrink if it's washed.
spanish: Esa tela va a encoger si se lava.

english: That painting is beautiful, and so is this one.
spanish: Ese cuadro es muy bonito, y este también.

english: That store sells many things besides furniture.
spanish: Esa tienda vende muchas cosas además de muebles.

english: The Red Cross distributed food to the refugees.
spanish: La Cruz Roja distribuyó alimentos a los refugiados.

english: The USA is a good market for Japanese products.
spanish: Estados Unidos es un buen mercado para los productos japoneses.

english: The United States had won the race to the moon.
spanish: Los Estados Unidos habían ganado la carrera a la Luna.

english: The United States' Civil War lasted four years.
spanish: La guerra civil de los Estados Unidos duró cuatro años.

english: The actor died at the height of his popularity.
spanish: El actor murió en el apogeo de su popularidad.

english: The air mainly consists of oxygen and nitrogen.
spanish: El aire está constituido principalmente de oxígeno y nitrógeno.

english: The armed forces occupied the entire territory.
spanish: Las fuerzas armadas ocuparon todo el territorio.

english: The arrival of the troops led to more violence.
spanish: La llegada de las tropas condujo a más violencia.

english: The audience clapped when the concert was over.
spanish: La audiencia aplaudió cuando el concierto había terminado.

english: The babysitter tried to sing the baby to sleep.
spanish: La niñera intentó cantarle al bebé para que se durmiera.

english: The backwardness of that country is well known.
spanish: El atraso de ese país es bien conocido.

english: The baseball game was put off till next Sunday.
spanish: El partido de béisbol fue aplazado hasta el próximo domingo.

english: The bell had already rung when I got to school.
spanish: Ya había sonado la campana cuando llegué al colegio.

english: The boy showed off his new bicycle to everyone.
spanish: El chico presumió de bicicleta nueva ante todo el mundo.

english: The boy spilled the ink, but he didn't mean to.
spanish: El niño derramó la tinta, pero no fue a propósito.

english: The campaign succeeded and he won the election.
spanish: La campaña tuvo éxito y él ganó las elecciones.

english: The captain gave the order to abandon the ship.
spanish: El capitán dio la orden de abandonar el barco.

english: The car's antenna is built into the windshield.
spanish: La antena del coche está integrada en el parabrisas.

english: The cause of his death still remains a mystery.
spanish: La causa de su muerte aún sigue siendo un misterio.

english: The cleaning lady interrupted the conversation.
spanish: La señora de la limpieza interrumpió la conversación.

english: The clearness of the explanation satisfied him.
spanish: La claridad de la explicación lo convenció.

english: The clearness of the explanation satisfied him.
spanish: La claridad de la explicación lo satisfizo.

english: The climate here is milder than that of Moscow.
spanish: El clima aquí es más suave que el de Moscú.

english: The climate in Japan is milder than in England.
spanish: El clima en Japón es más templado que en Inglaterra.

english: The company has a capital of a million dollars.
spanish: La compañía tiene un capital de un millón de dólares.

english: The concert concluded with the national anthem.
spanish: El concierto concluyó con el himno nacional.

english: The coup attempt was foiled at the last moment.
spanish: El intento de golpe fue frustrado en el último momento.

english: The dance had already started when I got there.
spanish: El baile ya había empezado cuando llegué.

english: The dance had already started when I got there.
spanish: El baile ya había comenzado cuando llegué allí.

english: The dining car's at the front end of the train.
spanish: El coche-comedor va a la cabeza del tren.

english: The driver advised us to fasten our seat belts.
spanish: El conductor nos dijo que nos abrochemos el cinturón de seguridad.

english: The earthquake reduced many villages to rubble.
spanish: El temblor de tierra redujo muchos pueblos a escombros.

english: The eggs I ate this morning both had two yolks.
spanish: Ambos huevos que me comí esta mañana tenían dos yemas.

english: The election campaign of 1880 was not exciting.
spanish: La campaña electoral de 1880 no fue interesante.

english: The electricity came on again in a few minutes.
spanish: La electricidad volvió luego de unos poco minutos.

english: The flood caused a disaster in their community.
spanish: La inundación ocasionó un desastre en su comunidad.

english: The flood prevented me from crossing the river.
spanish: La inundación me impidió cruzar el río.

english: The girl and her parents were very sympathetic.
spanish: La chica y sus padres eran muy simpáticos.

english: The girl was afraid to jump down from the roof.
spanish: La niña tenía miedo de saltar del tejado.

english: The government had to alter its foreign policy.
spanish: El Gobierno tuvo que modificar su política exterior.

english: The groom left the bride standing at the altar.
spanish: El novio huyó del altar.

english: The ground started to shake and the alarm rang.
spanish: La tierra empezó a temblar y sonó la alarma.

english: He cannot write English without making mistakes.
spanish: Él no puede escribir en inglés sin cometer errores.

english: He confessed that he had fallen in love with me.
spanish: Él confesó que se había enamorado de mí.

english: He demanded that I should pay the money at once.
spanish: Él me pidió que pagara inmediatamente en dinero.

english: He demanded that the savage dog be kept tied up.
spanish: Él exigió que tuvieran al perro salvaje amarrado.

english: He departed for London the day before yesterday.
spanish: Él salió hacia Londres anteayer.

english: He devoted all his time to the study of history.
spanish: Él dedicó todo su tiempo al estudio de la historia.

english: He didn't get in until 2 o'clock in the morning.
spanish: Él no regresó hasta las dos de la mañana.

english: He does not like what the journalists have said.
spanish: A él no le gusta lo que han dicho los periodistas.

english: He earns over 500 dollars a month from that job.
spanish: Él gana más de 500 dólares al mes con ese trabajo.

english: He fell asleep at the wheel and had an accident.
spanish: Se quedó dormido mientras conducía y tuvo un accidente.

english: He got tired of the work, and left it half-done.
spanish: Él se cansó del trabajo, y lo dejó a medio hacer.

english: He had two or three rather competent assistants.
spanish: Él tuvo dos o tres asistentes bastante competentes.

english: He has been the chief of his tribe for 35 years.
spanish: Él ha sido el jefe de su tribu por 35 años.

english: He has left his mother and girlfriend in France.
spanish: Él dejó a su madre y a su novia en Francia.

english: He has to wait until I bring him some warm milk.
spanish: Tiene que esperar hasta que le lleve algo de leche caliente.

english: He has transferred all his knowledge to his son.
spanish: Él traspasó todo su conocimiento a su hijo.

english: He has transmitted all his knowledge to his son.
spanish: Él le trasmitió todo su conocimiento a su hijo.

english: He insists on going to the park with his father.
spanish: Él insiste en ir al parque con su padre.

english: He is a director, and should be treated as such.
spanish: Él es un director y debería ser tratado como tal.

english: He is a scientist who is respected by everybody.
spanish: Él es un científico respetado por todos.

english: He is capable of running a mile in four minutes.
spanish: Él es capaz de correr una milla en cuatro minutos.

english: He is too short to get at the book on the shelf.
spanish: Es demasiado bajo para alcanzar el libro del estante.

english: He learned the news while reading the newspaper.
spanish: Él se enteró de la noticia leyendo el periódico.

english: He left the bedroom and entered the living room.
spanish: Él salió de la habitación y entró a la sala de estar.

english: He likes not only baseball but football as well.
spanish: No sólo le gusta el béisbol, sino también el fútbol.

english: He makes it a rule never to speak ill of others.
spanish: Él tiene por regla nunca hablar mal de otros.

english: He makes it a rule to take a walk every morning.
spanish: Tiene la costumbre de dar un paseo cada mañana.

english: He makes it a rule to take a walk every morning.
spanish: Tiene como norma dar un paseo cada mañana.

english: He must be at home. I see his car in his garage.
spanish: Debe de estar en casa, veo su coche en el garaje.

english: He needs a more productive outlet for his anger.
spanish: Él necesita una salida más productiva para su furia.

english: He never speaks English without making mistakes.
spanish: Él nunca habla inglés sin cometer errores.

english: He remained calm even in the presence of danger.
spanish: El permaneció impasivo incluso delante del peligro.

english: He reminded his wife to wake him up at 7:00 a.m.
spanish: Él recordó a su mujer que le tenía que despertar a las siete de la mañana.

english: He saved his friend at the risk of his own life.
spanish: Él salvó a su amigo arriesgando su propia vida.

english: He saw the boy jump over the fence and run away.
spanish: Vio al chico saltar la valla e irse corriendo.

english: He sent out the parcel the day before yesterday.
spanish: Él envió el paquete anteayer.

english: He smokes like a chimney and drinks like a fish.
spanish: Él fuma como un carretero y bebe como un cosaco.

english: He sneaked up on him in the middle of the night.
spanish: Él se le acercó sigilosamente en medio de la noche.

english: He snored all night and his wife couldn't sleep.
spanish: Roncó durante toda la noche y su esposa no pudo dormir.

english: He stayed in bed because he wasn't feeling well.
spanish: Se quedó en la cama porque no se sentía bien.

english: He thought that it would be interesting and fun.
spanish: Pensó que sería interesante y divertido.

english: He took over the business after his father died.
spanish: Él tomó el control del negocio después de que su padre muriera.

english: He translated Homer from the Greek into English.
spanish: Él tradujo a Homero del griego al inglés.

english: He translated the book from French into English.
spanish: Él tradujo el libro del francés al inglés.

english: He waited until ten and left shortly afterwards.
spanish: Él esperó hasta las diez y se fue poco después.

english: He was lying there with his legs bound together.
spanish: Él estaba tirado ahí con las piernas amarradas.

english: He was not completely satisfied with the treaty.
spanish: Él no estaba completamente satisfecho con el tratado.

english: He was promoted to the position of head teacher.
spanish: Él fue promovido al puesto de director.

english: He was the strongest candidate for the position.
spanish: Él fue el candidato más fuerte para el puesto.

english: He went to Paris, where he lived for five years.
spanish: Él se fue a París, donde vivió durante cinco años.

english: He who lives by the sword will die by the sword.
spanish: El que a hierro mata a hierro muere.

english: He would often sit here for hours doing nothing.
spanish: Se sentaría aquí con asiduidad durante horas sin hacer nada.

english: He's a man of his word, so you can count on him.
spanish: Él es un hombre de palabra, así que puedes contar con él.

english: He's a regular at the bars and pubs around here.
spanish: Él es un cliente regular en los bares y cantinas de por aquí.

english: He's been a patron of this store for many years.
spanish: Él ha sido un cliente de esta tienda durante muchos años.

english: He's coming back from America a week from today.
spanish: Él volverá de EEUU la primera semana a partir de hoy.

english: Her gray hair makes her look older than her age.
spanish: Su pelo gris la hace parecer más vieja.

english: Her old bike squeaked as she rode down the hill.
spanish: Su vieja bicicleta chirrió mientras bajaba por la colina.

english: Here, everybody feels respected and appreciated.
spanish: Aquí, todo el mundo se siente respetado y apreciado.

english: His bad leg prevented him from winning the race.
spanish: Su pierna mala le impidió ganar la carrera.

english: His mother didn't allow him to ride a motorbike.
spanish: Su madre no le dejó montar una moto.

english: His office is located in the center of the town.
spanish: Su oficina queda en el centro.

english: His parents helped whoever asked for their help.
spanish: Sus padres ayudaban a quienquiera que pidiera su ayuda.

english: His words excited everyone, even the opposition.
spanish: Sus palabras emocionaron a todos, incluso a la oposición.

english: Hot lemon with honey is a good remedy for colds.
spanish: Limón caliente con miel es un buen remedio para los resfriados.

english: How can you tell an Englishman from an American?
spanish: ¿Cómo podéis distinguir a un inglés de un estadounidense?

english: How long does it take to go to Okinawa by plane?
spanish: ¿Cuánto se tarda en ir a Okinawa en avión?

english: How long would it take to swim across the river?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tomaría atravesar el río a nado?

english: How many days does it usually take to get there?
spanish: ¿Cuántos días usualmente toma llegar allá?

english: How many flights to New York do you offer a day?
spanish: ¿Cuántos vuelos a Nueva York ofrecéis al día?

english: How many times a month do you write your mother?
spanish: ¿Cuántas veces al mes le escribes a tu madre?

english: How much is the car that you're planning to buy?
spanish: ¿Cuánto cuesta el coche que tienes previsto comprar?

english: How much will it cost to have my shoes repaired?
spanish: ¿Cuánto cuesta arreglar mis zapatos?

english: However badly you want it, it will never happen.
spanish: Por más que lo quieras, nunca pasará.

english: I always have two cups of coffee in the morning.
spanish: Siempre me tomo dos tazas de café por la mañana.

english: I am afraid that they don't get along very well.
spanish: Me temo que ellos no se llevan muy bien.

english: I am sending you a birthday present by air mail.
spanish: Te estoy enviando un regalo de cumpleaños por correo aéreo.

english: I am studying to be a translator or interpreter.
spanish: Me estoy preparando para ser traductor o intérprete.

english: I am studying to be a translator or interpreter.
spanish: Estoy estudiando para ser traductor o intérprete.

english: I apologize for the delay in sending the agenda.
spanish: Pido disculpas por la demora en enviar la agenda.

english: I asked Tom not to go there, but he went anyway.
spanish: Le pedí a Tom que no fuera allá, pero el fue igual.

english: I asked Tom to help me pull weeds in the garden.
spanish: Le pedí a Tom que me ayudase a sacar malas hierbas del jardín.

english: I asked Tom to wait for me at the train station.
spanish: Le pedí a Tom que me esperara en la estación de trenes.

english: I asked him not to play the piano late at night.
spanish: Le pedí que no tocara piano tarde por la noche.

english: I bought forty dollars' worth of gasoline today.
spanish: Compré cuarenta dólares de gasolina hoy.

english: I can be here for a while longer if you need me.
spanish: Puedo estar aquí por un rato más si me necesitas.

english: I can do that with one hand tied behind my back.
spanish: Puedo hacer eso con una mano atada detrás de mi espalda.

english: I can no more predict the future than I can fly.
spanish: Yo no puedo vaticinar el futuro más de lo que puedo volar.

english: I can see some people walking across the street.
spanish: Veo algunas personas caminando por la calle.

english: I can see some people walking across the street.
spanish: Puedo ver a algunas personas cruzando la calle.

english: I can't believe Tom left without saying goodbye.
spanish: No me puedo creer que Tom se haya ido sin decir adiós.

english: I can't figure out why he didn't tell the truth.
spanish: No entiendo por qué no dijo la verdad.

english: I can't go out because I have a lot of homework.
spanish: Tengo muchos deberes, así que no puedo salir.

english: I can't hug Tom if he doesn't want to be hugged.
spanish: No puedo abrazar a Tom si él no quiere que le abrace.

english: I can't see you without thinking of your mother.
spanish: No puedo imaginarte sin pensar en tu madre.

english: I can't send you all the files at the same time.
spanish: No puedo enviarte todos los archivos a la vez.

english: I can't stand the thought of losing you forever.
spanish: No soporto la idea de perderte para siempre.

english: I can't tell if Tom is dead or just unconscious.
spanish: No puedo decir si Tom está muerto o solo inconsciente.

english: I can't tell you how many times I've been there.
spanish: No puedo decirte cuántas veces he estado ahí.

english: I can't tell you why she was absent from school.
spanish: No puedo decirte por qué faltó a clase.

english: I can't understand what you're trying to get at.
spanish: No entiendo a qué querés llegar.

english: I confiscated a gun from a student this morning.
spanish: Confisqué un arma a un estudiante esta mañana.

english: I could have done better if I had had more time.
spanish: Podría haberlo hecho mejor si hubiera tenido tiempo.

english: I could not accept that my wife was really dead.
spanish: No podía aceptar que mi esposa realmente estuviera muerta.

english: I could run quite a bit faster when I was young.
spanish: Yo podía correr bastante más rápido cuando era joven.

english: I couldn't attend that party because I was sick.
spanish: No pude asistir a esa fiesta porque estaba enfermo.

english: I couldn't make myself heard in the noisy class.
spanish: Yo no pude hacerme escuchar en medio del ruido en la sala de clases.

english: I couldn't run fast enough to keep up with them.
spanish: No pude correr lo suficientemente rápido para seguirles el ritmo.

english: I didn't expect to see you at a place like this.
spanish: No esperaba encontrarte en un lugar como éste.

english: I didn't have the courage to tell her the truth.
spanish: No tuve los arrestos para decirle la verdad.

english: I didn't have the courage to tell her the truth.
spanish: No tuve el valor para contarle la verdad.

english: I didn't like this game until I started winning.
spanish: No me gustaba ese juego, hasta que empecé a ganar.

english: I didn't tell my girlfriend anything about this.
spanish: No le dije nada acerca de esto a mi novia.

english: I didn't want to leave without saying thank you.
spanish: No quería irme sin darte las gracias.

english: I don't believe you. You're always telling lies.
spanish: No te creo, siempre estás mintiendo.

english: I don't have any other hobbies besides football.
spanish: No tengo ningún otro pasatiempo más que el fútbol.

english: I don't have any other hobbies besides football.
spanish: El fútbol es mi único pasatiempo.

english: I don't have the power to finish the work alone.
spanish: No tengo la fuerza para terminar el trabajo solo.

english: I don't know why I'm in a bad mood this morning.
spanish: No sé por qué estoy de mal humor esta mañana.

english: I don't like to be kept waiting for a long time.
spanish: Odio que me hagan esperar mucho tiempo.

english: I don't really know why, but they don't like me.
spanish: En realidad no sé por qué, pero no les agrado a ellos.

english: I don't think Tom will be in Boston next summer.
spanish: No creo que Tom esté en Boston el verano que viene.

english: I don't think that I'm the only one who noticed.
spanish: No creo ser el único que lo notó.

english: I don't think this shirt goes with that red tie.
spanish: No creo que esta camisa combine con esa corbata roja.

english: I don't think this shirt goes with that red tie.
spanish: Yo no creo que esta camisa vaya con la corbata roja.

english: I don't understand a word of what you're saying.
spanish: No entiendo una palabra de lo que estás diciendo.

english: I don't understand why he didn't tell the truth.
spanish: No entiendo por qué no ha dicho la verdad.

english: I don't want that kind of life for our children.
spanish: No quiero esa clase de vida para nuestros hijos.

english: I don't want you to do anything or say anything.
spanish: No quiero que hagas o digas nada.

english: I don't want you to tell me what I already know.
spanish: No quiero que me digas lo que ya sé.

english: I dropped out of high school when I was sixteen.
spanish: Abandoné la escuela secundaria a los dieciséis.

english: I dropped out of high school when I was sixteen.
spanish: Dejé la escuela secundaria cuando tenía dieciséis años.

english: I escaped from the sinking boat with difficulty.
spanish: Con mucha dificultad escapé de un bote sumergiéndose.

english: I even tried writing a song about what happened.
spanish: Incluso traté de escribir una canción acerca de lo que ocurrió.

english: I feel bad about not having gone to his funeral.
spanish: Me siento mal por no haber ido a su funeral.

english: I forgot to turn off the TV before going to bed.
spanish: Olvidé apagar la televisión antes de irme a la cama.

english: I found my dog lying under the tree in our yard.
spanish: Encontré a mi perro acostado debajo de un árbol en su patio.

english: I go for a walk every day, except when it rains.
spanish: Paseo todos los días, excepto cuando llueve.

english: I got drunk last night and did something stupid.
spanish: Anoche me emborraché e hice algo estúpido.

english: I got more and more bored as the speech went on.
spanish: Me aburría cada vez más a medida que el discurso avanzaba.

english: I got together with some old friends last night.
spanish: Anoche quedé con algunos viejos amigos.

english: I had a premonition that something wasn't right.
spanish: Tuve el presentimiento de que algo no iba bien.

english: I had a slight headache, so I went to bed early.
spanish: Tenía un poco de dolor de cabeza, así que me fui a la cama temprano.

english: I had had my watch repaired, but it broke again.
spanish: Había reparado mi reloj, pero se rompió de nuevo.

english: I had just written the letter when he came back.
spanish: Cuando volvió yo acababa de terminar de escribir la carta.

english: I had some free time, so I wandered around town.
spanish: Tenía algo de tiempo libre, así que di vueltas por la ciudad.

english: I had to resort to threats to get my money back.
spanish: Tuve que recurrir a amenazas para conseguir mi dinero devuelta.

english: I hadn't realized the magnitude of the problems.
spanish: No me había dado cuenta de la magnitud del problema.

english: I have a lot of money and enough time to use it.
spanish: Tengo mucho dinero, y suficiente tiempo para ocuparlo.

english: I have a lot of work to clear up by the weekend.
spanish: Tengo mucho trabajo que terminar para el fin de semana.

english: I have an older brother and two younger sisters.
spanish: Yo tengo un hermano mayor y dos hermanas menores.

english: I have been to the airport to see my father off.
spanish: Estuve en el aeropuerto despidiéndome de mi padre.

english: I have come to the conclusion that he is guilty.
spanish: He llegado a la conclusión de que él es culpable.

english: I have some unfinished business to take care of.
spanish: Tengo algunos asuntos inconclusos, de los que ocuparme.

english: I have some unfinished business to take care of.
spanish: Tengo algunos asuntos inconclusos, de los que debo ocuparme.

english: I have the feeling I've already seen this movie.
spanish: Tengo la sensación de que ya he visto esta película.

english: I have the feeling that I'll sleep well tonight.
spanish: Tengo la impresión de que hoy voy a dormir bien.

english: I have to return this book to the library today.
spanish: Debo devolver este libro a la biblioteca hoy.

english: I haven't eaten French food since I left France.
spanish: No he comido comida francesa desde que dejé Francia.

english: I haven't had a chance to be alone with Tom yet.
spanish: No he tenido la oportunidad de estar a solas con Tom aún.

english: I heard a crash at about ten o'clock last night.
spanish: Anoche oí un choque cerca de las diez en punto.

english: I heard a strange noise coming from the kitchen.
spanish: Oí un sonido extraño venir de la cocina.

english: I hope you won't mind if I give you some advice.
spanish: Espero que no te importe que te dé algunos consejos.

english: I just want you to make a good first impression.
spanish: Solo quiero que causes una buena primera impresión.

english: I know Tom and Mary were more than just friends.
spanish: Yo sé que Tom y María eran más que solo amigos.

english: I know a guy who says he doesn't like ice cream.
spanish: Conozco a un chabón que dice que no le gusta el helado.

english: I know an English teacher who comes from Canada.
spanish: Conozco a un profesor de inglés que viene de Canadá.

english: I know what I want. I just haven't found it yet.
spanish: Sé lo que quiero, es solo que todavía no lo he encontrado.

english: I leave home before eight o'clock every morning.
spanish: Cada mañana yo salgo de casa antes de las ocho en punto.

english: I looked after the rabbits when I was at school.
spanish: Me ocupaba de los conejos cuando estaba en el colegio.

english: I need a volunteer to help Tom clean the garage.
spanish: Necesito un voluntario que ayude a Tom a limpiar el garaje.

english: I need you to show me what you have in your bag.
spanish: Necesito que me muestres lo que hay en tu bolsa.

english: I never want you to step foot in that bar again.
spanish: No quiero que vuelvas a poner un pie en ese bar.

english: I never wrote to her, despite the urge to do so.
spanish: Yo nunca le escribí a ella, a pesar de las ganas que tengo de hacerlo.

english: I notice the sale prices are written in red ink.
spanish: Noté que los precios de venta estaban escritos con tinta roja.

english: I often use SSH to access my computers remotely.
spanish: A menudo uso SSH para tener acceso remoto a mi computador.

english: I often used to play tennis with him on Sundays.
spanish: Yo a menudo solía jugar tenis con él los domingos.

english: I overslept and consequently couldn't join them.
spanish: Yo me quedé dormido y como consecuencia no pude unírmeles.

english: I owe him a great deal because he saved my life.
spanish: Estoy extraordinariamente en deuda con él por haber salvado mi vida.

english: I prefer not to eat meat because I'm vegetarian.
spanish: Prefiero no comer carne, porque soy vegetariano.

english: I promised to help my brother with his homework.
spanish: Prometí que ayudaría a mi hermano con sus deberes.

english: I purchased a telescope and a book on astronomy.
spanish: Compré un telescopio y un libro de astronomía.

english: I really want to spend some time alone with Tom.
spanish: De verdad quiero pasar tiempo solo con Tom.

english: I really want to spend some time alone with Tom.
spanish: De verdad quiero pasar tiempo sola con Tom.

english: I really wish I knew where Tom put my briefcase.
spanish: Ojalá supiera dónde ha dejado mi maleta Tom.

english: I received a letter informing me of his arrival.
spanish: Recibí una carta informándome de su llegada.

english: I received your letter the day before yesterday.
spanish: Anteayer recibí tu carta.

english: I recommend a thorough checkup for your husband.
spanish: Yo recomiendo una revisión completa para tu esposo.

english: I regret having said such a thing to my teacher.
spanish: Me arrepiento de haberle dicho eso al profesor.

english: I reserved my hotel room three weeks in advance.
spanish: Reservé mi habitación en el hotel con tres semanas de antelación.

english: I said good night to my parents and went to bed.
spanish: Le dije buenas noches a mis padres y me fui a la cama.

english: I saw Tom and Mary while I was waiting for John.
spanish: Vi a Tom y a Mary cuando estaba esperando a John.

english: I saw a fishing boat about a mile off the shore.
spanish: Vi un bote de pesca a alrededor de una milla de la costa.

english: I saw a man yesterday eating from a garbage can.
spanish: Ayer vi a un hombre comer de un bote de basura.

english: I saw her taking a walk in the park at midnight.
spanish: La he visto paseando por el parque a medianoche.

english: I shouldn't have drunk that last bottle of beer.
spanish: No debí haberme tomado esa última botella de cerveza.

english: I shouldn't have drunk that last bottle of beer.
spanish: No debería haberme bebido la última botella de cerveza.

english: I spent the whole afternoon trying to avoid Tom.
spanish: Me pasé toda la tarde intentando evitar a Tom.

english: I studied hard in order to pass the examination.
spanish: Estudié harto para pasar el examen.

english: I think it's highly unlikely that Tom will swim.
spanish: Creo que es muy poco probable que Tom vaya a nadar.

english: I think it's time for me to buy a decent camera.
spanish: Creo que es hora de que me compre una cámara decente.

english: I think it's time for me to get my eyes checked.
spanish: Creo que es hora de que me haga revisar los ojos.

english: I think it's time for me to move to the suburbs.
spanish: Creo que es hora de que me mude a los suburbios.

english: I think this dictionary is useful for beginners.
spanish: Creo que este diccionario es útil para los principiantes.

english: I think this dictionary is useful for beginners.
spanish: Este diccionario me parece útil para principiante.

english: I think this one is inferior to that in quality.
spanish: Yo pienso que éste es inferior a ése en calidad.

english: I thought Tom would give Mary your phone number.
spanish: Pensé que Tom le daría a María tu número telefónico.

english: I thought that he had already finished the work.
spanish: Creía que él ya había terminado el trabajo.

english: I thought the death penalty should be abolished.
spanish: Yo pensaba que la pena de muerte debía ser abolida.

english: I thought you weren't going to get here on time.
spanish: Pensé que no llegarían aquí a tiempo.

english: I thought you weren't going to get here on time.
spanish: Pensé que no llegarías aquí a tiempo.

english: I thought you'd always wanted to see this movie.
spanish: Pensé que siempre habías querido ver esta película.

english: I took shelter from rain under the shop's eaves.
spanish: Me refugié de la lluvia bajo el alero de la tienda.

english: I tried again and again, but I couldn't succeed.
spanish: Yo probé una y otra vez, pero no pude conseguirlo.

english: I tripped over the mat when I came in the house.
spanish: Me tropecé con el felpudo cuando entré a la casa.

english: I want Tom and Mary to say that they were wrong.
spanish: Quiero que Tom y Mary digan que estaban equivocados.

english: I want everyone to know that I'm not a murderer.
